(This doesn\'t break forum rules, does it?)

For me, it\'d have to be either Saints Row The Third or Super Smash Bros Brawl. KSP ranks high though.

Tough question. I\'d have to say Morrowind, even though I\'m fully aware that it\'s deeply flawed in many ways. But it\'s the game I\'ve connected the most deeply with. Its brilliance isn\'t immediately apparent, it requires that you spend time with the game, it requires that you live in its fictional world and learn how it works. Some of the most genius aspects of it are so subtle that it took me years to realize and recognize what exactly I was looking at.
